SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am16
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am16.client.view

Interface ViewInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
CLI, CodexGUI
public interface ViewInterface
Interface that includes all the methods needed to set up, start and update the game view.

  • Method Summary

  • Method Details

    • startView

      void startView(String[] args)
      Starts the view. This includes the view's user input manager.
      Parameters:
      args - The command line arguments to start the view with.

    • printGames

      void printGames(Set<String> gameIds, Map<String,Integer> currentPlayers, Map<String,Integer> maxPlayers, Map<String,LobbyState> lobbyStates)
      Show the existing game IDs to the player.
      Parameters:
      gameIds - The existing games' IDs.
      currentPlayers - The number of current players
      maxPlayers - The maximum number of players
      lobbyStates - The LobbyState of each game.

    • joinGame

      void joinGame(String gameId, String username, int numPlayers)
      Tells the view that the player has joined a game with the given username.
      Parameters:
      gameId - The id of the game which the player just joined.
      username - The username the player has joined the game with.
      numPlayers - The number of players expected to join the game.

    • rejoinInformationStart

      void rejoinInformationStart()
      Tells the view that information about a game which is being resumed is about to be sent.

    • rejoinInformationEnd

      void rejoinInformationEnd()
      Tells the view that information about the has all been sent and the game is about to resume.

    • addPlayer

      void addPlayer(String username)
      Adds a player to the game. Used to communicate the connection of a new player.
      Parameters:
      username - The new player's username.

    • setPlayers

      void setPlayers(List<String> usernames)
      Tells the view all the usernames of the players present in the game.
      Parameters:
      usernames - The list of usernames of the players present in the game.

    • setGameState

      void setGameState(GameState state)
      Sets the game state. To be called when the game's state changes.
      Parameters:
      state - The new game state.

    • setCommonCards

      void setCommonCards(PlayableCard[] commonResourceCards, PlayableCard[] commonGoldCards)
      Sets the common cards for the game. Should be called whenever these change.
      Parameters:
      commonResourceCards - The common resource cards (may also contain gold cards if the resource card deck is empty). Should always be of length 2.
      commonGoldCards - The common gold cards (may also contain resource cards if the gold card deck is empty). Should always be of length 2.

    • setDeckTopType

      void setDeckTopType(PlayableCardType whichDeck, ResourceType resourceType)
      Sets the types of cards at the top of the respective deck.
      Parameters:
      whichDeck - The deck which we are setting the top card of.
      resourceType - The resource type of the card on top of the given deck.

    • promptStarterChoice

      void promptStarterChoice(StarterCard starterCard)
      Prompts the user to choose the side of the given starter card.
      Parameters:
      starterCard - The starter card of the player.

    • choosingColors

      void choosingColors()
      Tells the client that the color-choosing phase has begun.

    • promptColorChoice

      void promptColorChoice(List<PlayerColor> colorChoices)
      Prompts the client to choose their color.
      Parameters:
      colorChoices - The possible choices for the player's color.

    • setColor

      void setColor(String username, PlayerColor color)
      Sets the player's color. If the player is still in the prompt because he didn't choose in time, the prompt is invalidated
      Parameters:
      username - The username whose color is being given.
      color - The color assigned to the player.

    • drawingCards

      void drawingCards()
      Tells the client that the cards for the game are being drawn.

    • setHand

      void setHand(List<PlayableCard> hand)
      Sets the player's hand.
      Parameters:
      hand - The player's hand.

    • addCardToHand

      void addCardToHand(PlayableCard card)
      Adds the given card to this player's hand.
      Parameters:
      card - The card to be added.

    • removeCardFromHand

      void removeCardFromHand(PlayableCard card)
      Removed the given card from this player's hand.
      Parameters:
      card - The card to be removed.

    • setOtherHand

      void setOtherHand(String username, List<RestrictedCard> hand)
      Sets the given player's restricted hand.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the player whose hand is being given.
      hand - The restricted hand.

    • addCardToOtherHand

      void addCardToOtherHand(String username, RestrictedCard newCard)
      Adds the given restricted card to the given user's hand.
      Parameters:
      username - The user to add this card to.
      newCard - The restricted card to be added.

    • removeCardFromOtherHand

      void removeCardFromOtherHand(String username, RestrictedCard cardToRemove)
      Removes the given restricted card from the given user's hand.
      Parameters:
      username - The user to remove this card from.
      cardToRemove - The restricted card to be removed.

    • setPlayArea

      void setPlayArea(String username, List<Position> cardPlacementOrder, Map<Position,BoardCard> field, Map<BoardCard,SideType> activeSides, Set<Position> legalPositions, Set<Position> illegalPositions, Map<ResourceType,Integer> resourceCounts, Map<ObjectType,Integer> objectCounts)
      Sets the given player's play area.
      Parameters:
      username - The player whose play area is being given.
      cardPlacementOrder - The order in which the cards were played in this play area.
      field - The user's field.
      activeSides - The map keeping track of which side every card is placed on.
      legalPositions - The set of positions on which the player can place cards.
      illegalPositions - The set of positions on which the player must not place cards.
      resourceCounts - A map containing the amount of each resource that the player has.
      objectCounts - A map containing the amount of each object that the player has.

    • playCard

      void playCard(String username, BoardCard card, SideType side, Position pos, Set<Position> addedLegalPositions, Set<Position> removedLegalPositions, Map<ResourceType,Integer> resourceCounts, Map<ObjectType,Integer> objectCounts)
      Adds the given card to the given player's play area.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the player who played the card.
      card - The played card.
      side - The card the new card was played on.
      pos - The position where the new card was played.
      addedLegalPositions - The set of new positions in which the player can play a card, following the move which was just made.
      removedLegalPositions - The set of positions in which the player can no longer play a card, following the move which was just made.
      resourceCounts - A map containing the amount of each resource that the player has, following the move which was just made.
      objectCounts - A map containing the amount of each object that the player has, following the move which was just made.

    • setGamePoints

      void setGamePoints(String username, int gamePoints)
      Sets a player's number of game points.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the player whose points are being set.
      gamePoints - The given player's number of game points.

    • setObjectivePoints

      void setObjectivePoints(String username, int objectivePoints)
      Sets a player's number of objective points.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the player whose points are being set.
      objectivePoints - The given player's number of objective points.

    • setCommonObjectives

      void setCommonObjectives(ObjectiveCard[] commonObjectives)
      Sets the common objectives for the game.
      Parameters:
      commonObjectives - The common objectives. Should always contain 2 elements.

    • promptObjectiveChoice

      void promptObjectiveChoice(List<ObjectiveCard> possiblePersonalObjectives)
      Prompts the player to choose their objective from the ones given.
      Parameters:
      possiblePersonalObjectives - The possible objectives the player can choose from. Should always contain 2 cards.

    • setPersonalObjective

      void setPersonalObjective(ObjectiveCard personalObjective)
      Sets the player's personal objective.
      Parameters:
      personalObjective - The player's personal objective.

    • setStartOrder

      void setStartOrder(List<String> usernames)
      Sets the turn order for the game.
      Parameters:
      usernames - The turn order. Should always contain as many usernames as were added at the beginning of the game.

    • turn

      void turn(String username)
      Tells the client that it is the given player's turn to play.
      Parameters:
      username - The player's username.

    • setWinners

      void setWinners(List<String> winnerUsernames, Map<String,ObjectiveCard> personalObjectives)
      Tells the client the winners of the game.
      Parameters:
      winnerUsernames - The winners of the game.
      personalObjectives - The personal objective of every player.

    • addMessages

      void addMessages(List<ChatMessage> messages)
      Adds all the messages given to the player's chat.
      Parameters:
      messages - The chat messages to add.

    • addMessage

      void addMessage(ChatMessage message)
      Adds the given message to the player's chat.
      Parameters:
      message - The new message.

    • promptError

      void promptError(String errorMessage, ErrorType errorType)
      Tells the client that an error has occurred.
      Parameters:
      errorMessage - The message that should be displayed to the user.
      errorType - The type of error that occurred.

    • notifyDontDraw

      void notifyDontDraw()
      Notifies the client that from now on they shouldn't draw cards anymore.

    • signalDisconnection

      void signalDisconnection(String whoDisconnected)
      Tells the client that another client has disconnected from the lobby.
      Parameters:
      whoDisconnected - The username of the player who disconnected.

    • signalGameSuspension

      void signalGameSuspension(String whoDisconnected)
      Tells the client that another client has disconnected, and the game is being suspended as a result to be rejoined later.
      Parameters:
      whoDisconnected - The username of the player who disconnected.

    • signalGameDeletion

      void signalGameDeletion(String whoDisconnected)
      Tells the client that another client has disconnected, and the game is being deleted as a result.
      Parameters:
      whoDisconnected - The username of the player who disconnected.

    • signalDeadlock

      void signalDeadlock(String username)
      Tells the client that a player has skipped their turn because of a deadlock.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the player who skipped their turn.

    • signalConnectionLost

      void signalConnectionLost()
      Tells the client that connection to the server was lost.
